metadata.title: Pure Ignis Lab Grown Diamond Vertical Bar Pendant Necklace in 14k Solid Gold/Silver 18" Chain (0.1 ctw, H Color, SI2 Clarity)
features: Lab created Diamond Vertical Bar Necklace in 14k Yellow Gold (1mm round diamonds) Total Carat Weight - 0.1ct
18 Inch 14K Yellow Gold Chain Shipped Free With Pendant

PURE IGNIS: We provide beautiful and high-quality jewelry that leaves a net zero carbon footprint. The lab-grown diamonds used are optically, chemically and physically identical to mined diamonds, but are 100% conflict-free with no human or environmental exploitation.

SERVICE: Certificate of Authenticity will be emailed and 30 Days Easy Returns - If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund. Returns, must be unworn and in the state that you received them.

PERFECT GIFT: It would be a great gift for Women, Girlfriend, Mom, Daughter, Wife, Sister, Grandmother and Granddaughter. Suitable Gift for every occasion Birthday (April Birthstone) Christmas, Thanksgiving, Anniversary, Wedding, Engagement, Graduation-Day, Valentine's Day, Women's Day and Mother's Day.
description: The luminosity of lab grown diamonds can be elevated to new heights of visual allure when they are embedded in a stunning design, as seen in this sophisticated piece of jewelry. Crafted from 14k white gold gleaming white gold, the single row bar dazzles with the brilliance of pave set, lab grown diamond accents. Its edges showcase milgrain detailing, which infuses a distinctive characteristic to the design. Purity of lab grown diamonds teamed with a stylish design make this vertical bar necklace a sheer indulgence for those who have a refined taste.
